radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild subsegmental atelectasis in the bilateral lower lobes (left greater than right). Fluid-filled and dilated appendix measuring up to 1.5 cm in caliber with extensive surrounding fat stranding. Inflammation of the cecal base. Multiple subcentimeter mesenteric lymph nodes in the right lower quadrant measuring up to 0.7 cm likely reactive. No evidence of free fluid in the pelvis or worrisome osseous lesions.
